name: Axel || A Scrolling Platformer || Plains || Mobile Friendly

description:
✩Axel✩

       Thanks For Viewing My Project!

               It took me over 2 months to make this!

☞ My first scrolling platformer!

☞ Read the instructions

✧ Instructions ✧

☞ Arrow Keys and WASD to move

☞ If your on mobile just swipe left, right and up

☞ You can double jump 

☞ On mobile you can swipe up twice to double jump
